resume.title: Sr. UX Designer
resume.description: Product design and front end development for a data-drivern logistics software startup.

resume.title: UX Architect
resume.description: Solo designer and Vue.js developer for Intrusion. Handled a Vue 3 migration, implemented tests, and built a few new web-based SaaS products to support broader network security projects.

resume.title: UX Architect
resume.description: Partnered with agile software teams to humanize data visualization apps used by various user groups. Was a contributor to Bayer global design system standards and documentation, improving design consistency and culture.

resume.title: Full Stack Developer
resume.description: Built user interfaces and back-end services for the WWT corporate website which has over 30,000 monthly visitors. Reduced time on task and improved edit accuracy by building a POC for editing content live from the website instead of using the legacy proprietary CDN.

resume.title: Sr. Software Design Engineer
resume.description: Improved virtual visits during COVID-19 by building a point-to-point video chat app, supporting 2k-3k video visits per day. Reduced pediatric ER visits and improved patient quality of life by creating a patient portal that connects sick kids and their caregivers to medical staff for 24/7 support.

resume.title: Sr. UX Designer
resume.description: Led design for multiple client projects including a roadside call center app that reduced call times and costs, a private security app that simplified Person of Interest management, and a real-time logistics tracking and ordering platform that enabled drop shipments to resupply partners. Operated as practice lead for a small design team and handled idendity design for new SaaS products.

resume.title: Product Designer
resume.description: Drove vision behind software solutions related to plant breeding and geospatial data collection. Supported agile development teams by working as an embedded designer and facilitating user testing sessions.

resume.title: UX Designer
resume.description: UX Designer and Front End Developer for various client-service projects. Transformed the online mortgage application for a major bank using conversational UI, massively growing online form submissions. Reduced product loss for WWT logistics by improving the UI for a damage control application.

resume.title: Owner / Chief Designer
resume.description: Chief designer, accountant, HR, customer service, and head of sales and marketing. Made people happy by pushing pixles as a graphic designer, web designer, and 3D artist.

resume.title: Senior Designer
resume.description: Led design for a new online product builder that increased sales and profit margins. Reduced costs by digitizing new product pipelines, reducing time to site by 75%. Maintained revenue through dry seasons by developing an auxiliary brand and managing operations of that business. Trained up the next generation of designers by providing thought leadership and mentorship.

resume.title: Adjunct Instructor
resume.description: Warped the minds and inspired the futures of eager students in the field of graphic design, 3D modeling, and computer animation. Gave lectures, provided life skills, and occasionally took attendance.
